title: PhEMA - T2DM
description: Patients with a diagnosis of T2DM but not T1DM, and either not prescribed a T2DM medication but having an abnormal diabetes lab (HbA1c >= 6.5% or glucose > 200 mg/dL), or prescribed both insulin and a T2DM medication, but only if the first T2DM prescription precedes the first insulin prescription.
